The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: I will probably never feel what I felt playing The Last of Us Part II.This game touched my emotional in a way that I can't explain.It's really amazing what Naughty Dog did with this franchise so loved by me and the rest of the fans. She had the courage to let someone come out of nowhere and kill Joel in such a brutal and sad way\, and then\, in the middle of the game\, show the motivation of whoever killed him\, in this case Abby.I'm sad about everything that happened to Ellie\, she's my favorite character\, I love her since the first game and even more in Part II\, but her search for revenge\, in the end\, left her with nothing and alone. She simply lost everything she had\, but because of herself.I don't understand how anyone might not have liked the game. Maybe it's because they still don't understand that it's not a game to make you happy or have fun\, but a game to make you reflect and put an end to your emotional.Simply a work of art.Congratulations\, Naughty Dog.Provavelmente nunca sentirei o que senti jogando The Last of Us Part II.Este jogo tocou meu emocional de uma maneira que não consigo explicar.É realmente incrível o que a Naughty Dog fez com essa franquia tão amada por mim e pelo resto dos fãs.
